rules.natural: If a driver is employed for a job, then either the driver has access to a facility or the driver has permission for a facility.
Provided that a driver is contracted for a job, either the driver has access to a facility or the driver has permission for a facility.
Either a driver is full time or a driver is employed for a job or a driver is contracted for a job.
A vehicle follows routes or a vehicle follows a schedule.
Under the condition that a vehicle follows a schedule, the vehicle is compliant.
If a vehicle has a GPS, then if the vehicle follows routes, the vehicle is compliant.
Provided that a vehicle has a navigator, if the vehicle follows routes, the vehicle is compliant.
A vehicle is overloaded or a vehicle has a GPS or a vehicle has a navigator.
If a vehicle has a weight limit, then it is not the case that the vehicle is overloaded.
A vehicle has a weight limit or a vehicle has a capacity check system.
Whenever a vehicle has a capacity check system, the vehicle is not overloaded.
Under the condition that a vehicle violates regulations, the vehicle has a violation.
If a vehicle has a violation, the vehicle gets fined.
If a driver passes a breathalyzer, it is not the case that the driver is sober.
Whenever a driver shows sobriety, the driver is not sober.
Provided that a driver takes a test, the driver passes a breathalyzer.
A driver takes a test or a driver demonstrates sobriety.
Under the condition that a facility operates from a facility, a driver requires a license.
A facility operates from a facility or a vehicle transports alcohol.
Provided that a driver uses a mobile app, either the vehicle has a GPS or the vehicle has a navigator.
A driver uses a mobile app or a driver uses a company device.
If a device has connectivity to a network, then if a driver uses a company device, the vehicle has a GPS or the vehicle has a navigator.
A supervisor monitors compliance of a vehicle or a supervisor checks documents.
If a supervisor checks documents, then if the vehicle violates regulations, the vehicle gets fined.
Whenever a supervisor reviews logs, if the vehicle violates regulations, the vehicle gets fined.
If a vehicle transports alcohol, then either a driver has a job or if the vehicle is not compliant, the vehicle uses a platform.

rules.prover9_expression: (reports_incident(driver, incident) | (-(monitors_compliance(supervisor, vehicle) -> reviews_logs(supervisor, logs)) -> issues_warning(supervisor, warning)))
rules.natural: A driver reports an incident or if it is not the case that if a supervisor monitors compliance of a vehicle, the supervisor reviews logs, then the supervisor issues a warning.
If an investigator confirms the truth of a report, it is not the case that the driver reports an incident.

If a sensor detects alcohol, it is not the case that the driver fails a test.
A sensor detects alcohol or a sensor alerts a system.
Under the condition that a sensor alerts a system, the system notifies security.
Whenever a system triggers an alarm, the driver does not fail a test.
Under the condition that a driver requires a license, either a driver has a job or if the vehicle is not compliant, the vehicle uses a platform.

A system activates a protocol or a system escalates an alert.
If a system escalates an alert, then if the system notifies security, the system locks a facility.
Whenever a vehicle is operational, the vehicle is compliant.
If a driver has access to a facility, then if the vehicle is not operational, the vehicle needs maintenance.
Provided that a driver has permission for a facility, if the vehicle is not operational, the vehicle needs maintenance.
If it is not the case that either a vehicle has a safety certificate or if the vehicle is insured, the vehicle is compliant, then the vehicle violates regulations.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if a driver demonstrates sobriety, the driver shows sobriety, the driver fails a test.
If it is not the case that if a manager administers a test, the driver does not fail a test, then the manager records a result.
If it is not the case that if a supervisor monitors compliance of a vehicle, the supervisor reviews logs, it is not the case that the supervisor issues a warning.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if an investigator conducts an investigation on a case, the investigator interviews witnesses, the investigator closes a case.
Whenever it is not the case that if an investigator conducts an investigation on a case, the investigator interviews witnesses, it is not the case that the investigator closes a case.
Under the condition that a vehicle is not compliant, the driver is sober.
If a vehicle is not compliant, it is not the case that the vehicle uses a platform.
